page.title: 10Games children play LISVANE
page.content: Bulldogs,soccer,mob & baseball often played outdoors.Ludo,monopoly,jigsaws & computer games indoors.{Baseball:} one team bats,the other fields.Aim to try & hit ball & run around bases arranged in a large diamond. you 're out if touched by the ball,or caught.{ {Murder in the dark}needs at least 10 people to be the murderer,policeman & dancers.The policeman goes out,the others dance in the dark,the murderer pinches someone who'dies'&the police- man tries to identify murderer. {Marbles}are coloured glass balls rang- ing from \ to 6 cms in size.One player throws or rolls his marble other play- er tries to hit 1st.players marble.Any number of people can play{Dungeons & {Dragons.}The dungeon master sets a mission which players attempt.The dun- geon is a cave with monsters. To fini- sh player completes mission or 'dies'.
